title: swHandleWindowFromHandleCreationFailure_e
description: Actions on failure to create a .NET control on a PropertyManager page.

values.description: = Create the PropertyManager page without the .NET control. (default)
= Cancel the creation of the PropertyManager page.
= Try to create the .NET control again.
